summary: The diff updates mascot paths in TopNav, HeroSection, and FooterSection to point to the requested generated asset filename, but it does not add the actual PNG asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and it violates the requirement to keep English alt text (alt text is non-English/Hinglish).

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and add the new square transparent PNG mascot asset under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename timepass-mascot-logo-upload-redhint.dim_512x512.png (derived from Untitled_Artwork.jpeg with a subtle red accent).
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added in the diff; the required PNG asset is not present/introduced anywhere in the changes shown, so the new mascot image itself is not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Keep existing English alt text consistent with the brand name for all updated mascot tags (HeroSection, TopNav, FooterSection) and do not introduce non-English UI text.
missing_requirements.reason: The updated/used alt text is not English (it is Hinglish: "Time-pass nhi ho rha mascot" / "Time-pass nhi ho rha mascot"), violating the acceptance criteria requiring English alt text.
